actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Natural Resources.

actions.subcommittee: National Parks, Forests and Public Lands
actions.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on National Parks, Forests and Public Lands.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on National Parks, Forests, and Public Lands

official_title: To require the Secretary of Agriculture to convey certain lands in Austin, Nevada, to the Austin Historic Mining District Historical Society, and for other purposes.

summary.text: Directs the Secretary of Agriculture to convey certain lands in Austin, Nevada, to the Austin Historic Mining District Historical Society for use as a museum or other public purpose.

titles.title: To require the Secretary of Agriculture to convey certain lands in Austin, Nevada, to the Austin Historic Mining District Historical Society, and for other purposes.
